text:
Good roast duck and crispy roast pork. Friendly boss asked us if we wanted the head when we ordered whole duck and gave a large bowl of soup.
Roast pork crispy skin is the highlight, charsiew is the well marbled heavily sauced rich sticky kind but could have been charred a little more.
Noodles were just ok, had some pork lard bits but were otherwise a little too plain and under seasoned.
Our go to for curry noodles. Option to select different types of noodles with the usual chicken duck roast or char siew pork. Service staff always friendly and cheerful.

Tried the noodles, the ingredients were plentiful. Meat was tasty, but overall, the taste was like having a bowl of chicken curry noodles rather than a bowl of Ipoh curry noodles. So, 3 stars only for me.

Excellent noodle quality and the seasoning is perfect! Delicious, old school taste, ðŸ˜‹. Portion size is good and therefore, price is reasonable. Saw them roasting and deep frying all the days offering, on the spot. The curry noodle gravy could be thicker. Service is good. My go to, roast meat stall, from now on.
It's a nice place for a delicious Roasted delight with friends and family for any occasion or celebration
